name: Christa Hess
what_you_do: Founder of Grit N Grow Kidz Academy, empowering children through entrepreneurship education, emotional regulation, and essential life skills.
business_focus: Empowering children through entrepreneurship education, emotional regulation, and life skills development.
who_you_serve: Children ages 9-12 and their parents, helping young people develop entrepreneurial skills, confidence, and emotional resilience.
offering: Kidpreneur education, mentoring, and entrepreneur coaching for kids covering business fundamentals, problem-solving, emotional regulation, and financial literacy.
bio: Christa Hess is the founder of Grit N Grow Kidz Academy, a certified Kidpreneur Educator based in Columbus, Ohio. With over 20 years of experience nurturing creativity and business acumen in children, she teaches business fundamentals, problem-solving, emotional regulation, and financial literacy to young leaders. As a mother of two, she is dedicated to helping children cultivate grit, overcome challenges, and unleash their potential.
service_provided: Kidpreneur education, mentoring, entrepreneur coaching for kids, hybrid online and in-person coaching
